## This room will be closed and archived.
** @/all Please move discussion of this topic to our forum, or to one of the official Free Code Camp chat rooms: http://forum.freecodecamp.com/t/free-code-camp-official-chat-rooms/19390**

freecodecamp 中文翻译项目   欢迎加入
Understood. However up to now the agreement with developers is what I told u.

@vtamara In leonfeng version, he used "`nameCn` and `descriptionCn` are for Simplified Chinese. `nameTw` and `descriptionTw` are for Traditional Chinese", so I would pefer `nameCn` and `nameTw` one. If you want to use `titleZhCn` and `titleZhTw`one that's okay, but you should consider that.
(If someone would make traditional chinesse translation should use titleZhTw and descriptionZhTw).  Sounds good for you?
Right in the descriptions and titles for simplified chinese please use titleZhCn and descriptionZhCn
@iigmir 那太好了，是的，已经有些翻译了，我还尝试与译者联系，但无法联系上。

https://github.com/FreeCodeCamp/FreeCodeCamp/issues?utf8=%E2%9C%93&q=is%3Aopen+label%3Atranslation+chinese+

看來已經有些被翻譯了。

@vtamara The different between Simplified and Traditional is using region, just like American English and British English, but more differences.
@wuyongzhi 那我繁體，因為我用繁體中文。雖然因為工作關係，時間少了點。
@iigmir :) Good question, i think we can create two Chinese version, This may require a different translator. I plan to create a Simplified Chinese translation, Because I am better at Simplified.
However there is start of both simplified and traditional.  But I guess better concentrate in one.
I invite you to speak in chinesse (IMHO better one chinese version)

Hi there, as a native Chinese speaker, I'm glad to see this room create.
Now, first question: We all know that there're two Chinese characters system being used: Simplified and Traditional. Should we create two Chinese version? Or one version only?
